Articles.Content:
i keep getting this glitch

it might be cause by the demv mk.3 ex

also how do you make the pictures bigger?

Links to larger pictures are the following, just put them in tags.

http://i.imgur.com/gdsrtLB.png

http://i.imgur.com/7LIGKG6.png

http://i.imgur.com/I2KklGr.png

What is the problem? I don't understand.
The parts are partially transparent, as if the camera was clipping through them. I've seen this before but I don't know the cause.
They should totally make that something that could be turned on or off.

Yeah, I had no idea that it actually rendered the Kerbals inside command pods while in ship view. I just assumed their little Starfox-esque portraits were rendered independently. It goes to show they got the scaling of the parts right, at least.
the internal view shows up next to the ship though

It is a problem with the DEMV mk3, or rather the plugin it uses. There's a new version of sfrPartModules1.dll that's used by the DEMV seat to show the Kerbs in external view that's been fixed. It's included in the new SFR pod, I'd try that new .dll.

I've seen that glitch before to, but only with a DEMV mark 3 EX attached/within physics range somewhere near the ship. Seems to have something to do with whatever kind of sorcery bobcat used to make the game render a kerbal sitting on the seat.
